statements: SELECT * FROM MeetingSchedule WHERE meeting_id = 1;
SELECT organizer_name, meeting_date FROM MeetingSchedule WHERE end_time > '17:00:00';
SELECT * FROM MeetingSchedule ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT meeting_id, agenda FROM MeetingSchedule WHERE organizer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT DISTINCT organizer_name FROM MeetingSchedule WHERE meeting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM MeetingSchedule WHERE meeting_date = '2022-09-15' AND organizer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT organizer_name, agenda FROM MeetingSchedule WHERE start_time >= '10:00:00';
SELECT * FROM MeetingSchedule WHERE agenda LIKE '%project%';
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_date, start_time, end_time FROM MeetingSchedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_meetings FROM MeetingSchedule;
SELECT * FROM meeting_schedule;
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_date, start_time FROM meeting_schedule WHERE meeting_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM agenda WHERE presenter = 'Alice';
SELECT agenda_item, presenter, duration_minutes FROM agenda WHERE meeting_id = 2 ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT meeting_topic, meeting_date FROM meeting_schedule WHERE start_time >= '09:00:00' AND end_time <= '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM meeting_schedule WHERE meeting_date >= '2022-01-01' AND meeting_topic <> 'Team Building'
SELECT meeting_id, meeting_topic, start_time, end_time FROM meeting_schedule WHERE start_time < '14:00:00' ORDER BY end_time DESC
SELECT meeting_topic, presenter, duration_minutes FROM meeting_schedule JOIN agenda ON meeting_schedule.meeting_id = agenda.meeting_id WHERE agenda_item = 'Project Update'

SELECT meeting_schedule.meeting_id, meeting_schedule.meeting_topic, agenda.agenda_item, agenda.presenter FROM meeting_schedule INNER JOIN agenda ON meeting_schedule.meeting_id = agenda.meeting_id WHERE meeting_schedule.meeting_date = '2022-03-15'
SELECT DISTINCT meeting_topic FROM meeting_schedule ORDER BY meeting_date ASC, start_time ASC
SELECT * FROM meeting_schedule;
SELECT meeting_id, topic, organizer FROM meeting_schedule WHERE meeting_date = '2022-05-12';
SELECT meeting_id, COUNT(*) AS agenda_items FROM meeting_agenda GROUP BY meeting_id;
SELECT DISTINCT organizer FROM meeting_schedule ORDER BY organizer DESC;
SELECT agenda_id, presenter, topic FROM meeting_agenda WHERE time_allocated > '01:00:00';
SELECT * FROM meeting_schedule WHERE meeting_date = '2022-12-25';
SELECT topic, start_time, end_time FROM meeting_schedule ORDER BY meeting_date DESC;
SELECT organizer, COUNT(*) AS attendees_count FROM meeting_schedule GROUP BY organizer;
SELECT * FROM meeting_agenda WHERE presenter = 'John Doe' AND time_allocated > '1 hour';
SELECT meeting_id, topic, presenter FROM meeting_agenda JOIN meeting_notes ON meeting_agenda.agenda_id = meeting_notes.agenda_id ORDER BY note_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_title, organizer_name FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM participants ORDER BY participant_role DESC;
SELECT agenda_topic, agenda_description FROM agendas WHERE agenda_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT meeting_title, start_time, end_time FROM meetings JOIN schedule ON meetings.meeting_id = schedule.meeting_id;
SELECT * FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT meeting_title, organizer_name FROM meetings WHERE meeting_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT participant_name, participant_email, participant_role FROM participants WHERE participant_role = 'Moderator';

SELECT m.meeting_title, s.start_time, s.end_time, p.participant_name FROM meetings m JOIN schedule s ON m.meeting_id = s.meeting_id JOIN participants p ON s.participant_id = p.participant_id WHERE s.start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '10:00:00';

SELECT m.meeting_title, p.participant_name, a.agenda_topic FROM meetings m JOIN schedule s ON m.meeting_id = s.meeting_id JOIN participants p ON s.participant_id = p.participant_id JOIN agendas a ON m.meeting_id = a.meeting_id WHERE a.agenda_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM meetings;
SELECT meeting_name, meeting_date FROM meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants WHERE participant_role = 'Attendee' ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT agenda_topic, agenda_description FROM agendas JOIN meetings ON agendas.meeting_id = meetings.meeting_id WHERE start_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT note_content FROM notes JOIN discussions ON notes.discussion_id = discussions.discussion_id WHERE discussions.agenda_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM meetings
SELECT meeting_name, meeting_date FROM meetings WHERE start_time > '08:00:00'
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC
SELECT agenda_topic, agenda_description FROM agendas WHERE meeting_id = 1001
SELECT discussion_topic, discussion_details FROM discussions WHERE agenda_id = 2002
